text: Amsterdam(Netherlands)| Relocation + Visa| Data Scientist roles @ Booking.com Booking.com is hiring all types of data science people. We have roles with focus on machine learning and recommender systems: http://grnh.se/2prwsm The more analytically, data mining and business focused but still quite techy Data Scientist: http://grnh.se/tvaxh7 And the more senior, metor-type but still hands-on position: http://grnh.se/rpavt7 These people work across different departments and are able to influence the online experience of millions of users world-wide. We provide an extensive relocation package.
